name: Icy Impact
description:
Play as a small fire skull and avoid the falling ice creatures! Thanks for checking it out!

Use either the A + D keys or the Left + Right arrow keys to move.

Space to Dash while moving

Welcome to my exploration into Unity. This was created alongside the tutorial made by Blackthornprod and expanded on to include custom assets, sounds, music, and score tracking.

  • Music was created using Bosca Ceoil
  • All art assets were created in Procreate
  • Creature, collision and "death" sounds were created in Audacity
  • The flame sound during idleness and one monster hiss were modified and retrieved from the Youtube Audio Library

 P.S. Best on 16:9 ratio screens ❤️
